website_summaries.verdict: Though somewhat basic compared to other Nixon watches on our list, it's worth considering for men who prefer a smaller watch with a no-frills design.
pros: Features a sleek silver-tone finish in a classic design that can be worn with just about any look
Sturdy build, yet smaller and more affordable than some other Nixon styles
cons: The clasp seems slightly flimsy compared to other models by the brand

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch, wear it with everything
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, really well made and goes with most outfits. A nice watch to smarten up a bit; but also looks great with a t-shirt. I usually struggle to find watches that aren’t either too masculine for my liking or too small on my wrist (I’m very tall and so most ‘womens’ watches get lost on my arm), but the simplicity of this makes it a nice unisex watch.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey C.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my purchase. I see some reviews criticising some things but I disagree as my watch has been flawless in every aspect. I’ve been wearing (and skating) in mine for nearly 2 months now and it’s still spotless. For the money I paid for it I’m really happy, Iv always liked Nixon watches and this one is the right mix of smart and casual.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny duke

customer_reviews.title: You beauty
customer_reviews.text: Flat black with gold. Really nice size bezel and easy to adjust to your wrist width. Sleek, comfortable, stylish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it....it's got "that something."
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really worth buying....very stylish yet understated.....the green baize dial is just sumptuous.....a winner.
customer_reviews.author: artemis

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch - Especially if you are looking for a reasonably priced gold piece
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this watch. The straps are quite loose so can be a bit fiddly at first to put on, but other than that it is a gem. Looks really clean with both formal and casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knock off don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is not from Nixon. This is a knock off I bought the gold version and the sliding buckle doesn’t work anymore the watch fell down in the middle of a party I can’t even wear the watch no more. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and they were over the moon with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mafia mama

customer_reviews.title: Nixon
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust looks nice and the price is quite good
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and slim design!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for everyday. Love the slim design. Was worried that it would look tacky but the finish is really cool and had a lot of compliments! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: football_mad

customer_reviews.title: Gold / Green mens watch
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch fits perfect and looks really good when wore, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN YARDLEY

customer_reviews.title: Time Teller and nothing more
customer_reviews.text: Simple, elegent - no nonsense watch, it's called and time teller - there's a clue there somewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Solid and great quality
customer_reviews.text: A very handsome watch. Classic look that would suit to any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubish bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the braclet, I am not sure it’s safe, and the instructions sent to alter the bracelet were the wrong ones for the watch
customer_reviews.author: Hillhunter

customer_reviews.title: Lovely watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Shame about the box, came with sellotape around it not great for a gift. Actually watch was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love that watch. It's really beautiful and excellent. I'd recommend anyone to acquire it.
customer_reviews.author: Lxi B.

customer_reviews.title: A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality watch. Looks good when wearing it. Bought it as a present and the person really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: E M Fraser

customer_reviews.title: My first Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch, well what can I say? I was not expecting this sort of build quality for such a cheap watch, it was MUCH better than expected. I didn't know anything about watches, as this was my first, apart from that Nixon is a good quality watch tailor. But, they don't only have watches for sale, there is electrical good as well, which I expect to be just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Vega Real

customer_reviews.title: I just go the watch but it looks great! The wrist band is also easy to adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: I just go the watch but it looks great! The wrist band is also easy to adjust and it fits well if you have a smaller wrist or if you prefer watches smaller in diameter (this one has 37 mm). Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son loves it he even bought sun glasses to match
customer_reviews.author: pattypoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great watch at a great price, big on the wrist .... simple & classy.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and stylish watch. Bought for my 16 year old son for Christmas and he's very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable swag
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch worth wearing if you love to have some swag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy teenager. Shipped to New Zealander. Still cheaper than buying here.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Byrd

customer_reviews.title: You beauty
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high quality product and arrived well ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The black on the strap has started to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Even if you can't tell the time you need this watch...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn a watch in years but as soon as I got this I have been wearing it almost everyday. It really is a lovely looking watch and works fine. If I'm honest I rarely use it to tell the time, I just wear it to look cool which works as the watch is so damn stylish. Since buying this watch I have been asked out on several dates (and I'm a guy). So is this watch worth buying? You tell me...
customer_reviews.author: SavageMan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of good Nixon reviews out there. Read them instead
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Bad strap design
customer_reviews.text: nice watch but very badly designed strap . It fell off when i was out walking & i couldn't find it .Spent ages looking -- Very annoying total rubbish design . I've never had a problem with a watch strap before . Be warned!
customer_reviews.author: jules

product_meta.title: Nixon Time Teller A0452730-00. Silver and Black, and Gold Women’s Watch (37mm. Stainless Steel Band/Black Stamped and Gold Watch Face)
product_meta.description:
MAKING THE LITTLE STUFF BETTER.
We make the little things better. The stuff you have that isn't noticed first, but can't be ignored. We pay attention to it. We argue about it. We work day and night to make the little things as good as it can be, so when you wear it, you feel like you've got a leg up on the rest of the world.

SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY.
Nixon's Supplier Code of Conduct ensures all of our suppliers are adhering to socially responsible business practices, meaning all products are produced under lawful, humane, and ethical conditions.

ACCESSORIES THAT REFLECT WHO WE ARE & THE LIFE WE LIVE.
Fueled by adventures far and wide, and sometimes by those that happen just down the street, we deliver products that meet your needs. We travel the globe to experience life; the journey to get there takes shape in the things we create.

EXPRESS YOURSELF.
When you wear a watch, you deserve to have something that reflects your entire package. You may not know how to say it, but you've got something to say and we're here to provide that voice.

Clean lines cut through cloudy philosophy, while its simple, high concept design keeps things precise.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :15.67 x 3.86 x 3.23 inches; 3.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :A0452730
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium ion batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :July 5, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Nixon Inc.
 * ASIN :B0716DRK1V

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #1071 inMen's Contemporary & Designer Watches

Fueled by adventures far and wide, and sometimes by those that happen just down the street, we deliver products that meet your needs. We travel the globe to experience life; the journey to get there takes shape in the things we create.

EXPRESS YOURSELF.

Clean lines cut through cloudy philosophy, while its simple, high concept design keeps things precise.
feature_bullets: TIME TELLER, SILVER, BLACK AND GOLD. The 37mm Time Teller has a 3-hand movement, applied indices and custom-molded hands. It has a 5-link stainless steel jewelry style bracelet and sliding buckle
ORIGINAL NIXON DESIGN. An all-time best-seller with an unpretentious versatile appearance, this women’s watch is water resistant up to 100m and protects against everything from rain to surf
FUELED BY ADVENTURES. We deliver products that meet your needs in various high-stress work and play environments, whether it’s across the globe or down the street
FOR A LIFE WELL LIVED. Through our dedicated teams’ perspectives, we contribute to a single unified expression: team-designed, custom-built accessories
